Subnets must start with subnet-, followed by 8 or 17 alphanumeric characters.

Subnets must start with subnet-, followed by 8 or 17 alphanumeric characters.

long_desc.S: Verify that the value entered here is the Instance Profile name not the IAM Role name, they maybe different. If you use the AWS CLI, API, or an AWS SDK to create a role, you create the role and instance profile as separate actions, with potentially different names.

validation_regex_msg.S: A valid IPv4 IP address must be provided.

content_html.S:
The following Migration Strategies are commonly used in Cloud Migration projects. The AWS Cloud Migration factory solution supports the automation activities to assist with these strategies, for Rehost and Replatform prepackaged automations are provided, and for other strategies customized automations can be created and imported into the AWS CMF solution:
  • Retire - Server retired and not migrated, data will need to be removed and any software services decommissioned.
  • Retain - Server will remain on-premise , assessment should be preformed to verify any changes for migrating dependent services.
  • Relocate - VMware virtual machine on-premise, is due to be relocated to VMware Cloud on AWS, using VMware HCX. Currently AWS CMF does not natively support this capability, although custom automation script packages coudl be used to interface with this service.
  • Rehost - AWS Cloud Migration Factory supports native integration with AWS MGN, selecting this strategy will enable the options in the server UI to support specifying the required parameters to migrate a server instance to EC2 using block level replication. The AWS CMF Solution comes packaged will all the required automation scripts to support the standard tasks required to migrate a server, all of which can be initiated from the CMF web interface.
  • Repurchase - Service that the server is currently supporting will be replaced with another service.
  • Replatform - AWS Cloud Migration Factory supports native integration to create Cloud Formation templates for each application in a wave, these Cloud Formation template are automatically generated through the UI based on the properties of the servers defined here, and can then be deployed to any account that has had the target AWS CMF Solution CFT deployed.
  • Reachitect - Service will be rebuilt from other services in the AWS Cloud.

validation_regex_msg.S: Dedicated Host IDs must start with h-, followed by 8 or 17 alphanumeric characters.
Network Interface ID must start with eni- followed by 8 or 17 alphanumeric characters.

content_html.S:
If Network Interface ID is provided you cannot set Subnet IDs, as the instance will be launched with this Network Interface ID.

This Network Interface ID will be assigned to the migrating server.

validation_regex_msg.S: Network Interface ID must start with eni- followed by 8 or 17 alphanumeric characters.

content_html.S:
If 'Network Interface ID -Test' is provided you cannot set 'Subnet IDs - Test', as the instance will be launched with this Network Interface ID.

This Network Interface ID will be assigned to the migrating server.
